subject: Robberies and Thefts
Tour of California (Bicycle Race)
lead_paragraph: The Sacramento police have arrested two men on charges related to the theft of a bicycle belonging to Lance Armstrong. Officers said they arrested Lee Crider, 39, and Le Dung, 34. The officers said Crider stole Armstrong’s time-trial bike from the back of a rental truck in February during the Tour of California, then sold it to Le, who turned it in to the police four days after it was reported stolen.
